list.name: Hard Hat & Vest Detection AI Project
list.description: An AI-powered object detection system for detecting hard hats, safety vests, and heads in images and videos. Built with PyTorch and YOLO, includes dataset preparation, training, validation, and real-time detection.

list.name: Khmer Stop Word Remover
list.description: A Python package that removes stop words from Khmer text, enhancing natural language processing tasks.

list.name: G4F E-Commerce Platform
list.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built as a database course project. It includes a scalable REST API, a modern Next.js frontend, and a data scraper pipeline. The system supports authentication, product & category management, orders, payments, and role-based access control.

list.name: Network Scanner
list.description: A tool to scan and analyze network devices, providing insights into network performance and security.

list.name: Project Management Risk Dataset Analysis
list.description: A comprehensive analysis of a risk dataset using Python, Pandas, and Matplotlib. The project includes data cleaning, exploratory data analysis, and visualization to uncover insights and patterns.
